commit.message:
Rollup merge of #85628 - LeSeulArtichaut:thir-null-lowercase, r=estebank

Replace more "NULL" with "null"

Error messages in THIR unsafeck still contain "NULL", make them lowercase to be consistent with MIR unsafeck (cc #84842).

verification.payload:
tree a628d323a4d354fea4fef7cea0beddb8b9de92d7
parent 9d3b9cdb2c34cf9d64695b0d5d9ff5134c7add27
parent 3559565e071c043f48c95a709d6b521e6efe7757
author Guillaume Gomez <guillaume1.gomez@gmail.com> 1621875217 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1621875217 +0200

Rollup merge of #85628 - LeSeulArtichaut:thir-null-lowercase, r=estebank

Replace more "NULL" with "null"

Error messages in THIR unsafeck still contain "NULL", make them lowercase to be consistent with MIR unsafeck (cc #84842).

files.patch:
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ error[E0133]: dereference of raw pointer is unsafe and requires unsafe function
 LL |         *(1 as *mut u32) = 42;
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ dereference of raw pointer
    |
-   = note: raw pointers may be NULL, dangling or unaligned; they can violate aliasing rules and cause data races: all of these are undefined behavior
+   = note: raw pointers may be null, dangling or unaligned; they can violate aliasing rules and cause data races: all of these are undefined behavior
